    • setGameList

      public void setGameList(HashMap<String,List<String>> availableGames)
      Sets the game list with the provided available games. If the game list is empty, it creates new Game objects based on the available games and adds them to the list.
      Parameters:
      availableGames - The available games represented as a HashMap, where the keys are game IDs and the values are lists of player names.
